word:
[Battle Creek,] Tuesday, March 5, 1889 
     We had Dr. Kellogg's team and rode out to Richard Godsmark's. Emma White and Sister Whitney went with me. Found the roads not very bad. Sister Godsmark was at Battle Creek. Otho, who was with his wife and wife's sister at Brother Godsmark's, went to Battle Creek for his mother and we took dinner together.
